summary: Raises the number of NPCs in a cell that can have AI, normally the limit is only 20 with the rest of the NPCs just standing around.
descriptionHtml:
Greetings.


This is a super simple tweak to two game settings. Created with WryBash, the latest version as of 2-5-2014 .

Attempts to increase number of NPCs with AI in a cell. Normally the limit is only 20 with the rest of the NPCs just standing around. Mods like ASIS, SOT/UDE will benefit from having more NPCS using their AI. Immersion breaking just to have them standing around while you hit them.

The new limits are 100 for pcs in a cell in general, and 80 for npcs in combat.

Install: place last in load order.

Also on the files section is a PDF and word document that will walk you step by step in making this change yourself. This is useful if you already use wrybash .

[center][url=https://www.instagram.com/moddingheaven/][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/923/sYzebp.png[/img][/url]    [url=https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC35zF0WXRHSvL0F7DUoHMEw][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/923/G8PRqH.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100011257417644][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/923/2j6nDq.png[/img][/url]      [url=https://twitter.com/tonycubed2/][img]http://imagizer.imageshack.us/v2/150x100q90/922/3DL3o9.png[/img][/url][/center]
author: Tonycubed2 and SOT Gang and Refusedzero
